schema.message: The "foo" attribute (from no namespace) is not supported.

test.name: [complexType] node not white space neither comment

schema.message: The node is not allowed ("foo").

test.name: [complexType] foo child element is not supported

schema.message: The "foo" element (from no namespace) is unexpected, expected: "annotation", "simpleContent", "complexContent", "group", "all", "choice", "sequence", "attribute" or "attributeGroup".

The "mixed" attribute is invalid: "True" is an invalid boolean datatype.
The "mixed" attribute is invalid: "False" is an invalid boolean datatype.
The "mixed" attribute is invalid: "2" is an invalid boolean datatype.
